title: BBQ fork, pizza cutter and driver’s licence: Minnesota man allegedly poses as FBI agent to free Luigi Mangione; arrested
summary_full: A bizarre attempt to free a high-profile inmate at a Brooklyn jail was thwarted when a Minnesota man, armed with a BBQ fork and pizza cutter, allegedly posed as an FBI agent. He presented fake court orders to release Luigi Mangione, accused in a CEO's murder. Authorities apprehended the suspect, ensuring no inmate escape and facility operations remained undisturbed.
